LABEL: 0x133
STRING: 「Isn't it cramped in there?」

LABEL: 0x160
STRING: 「I'm fine! Somehow!」

LABEL: 0x1AF
STRING: Tokiwa's voice coming from the speaker next to my ear sounded as energetic as ever.

LABEL: 0x201
STRING: I could tell she was even more excited than usual.

LABEL: 0x23B
STRING: We were inside the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x253
STRING: Tokiwa and I stood side by side in the darkness in our diving suits.

LABEL: 0x293
STRING: ...Come to think of it, this was the first time I'd gone out to the deep sea with someone else.

LABEL: 0x2D3
STRING: Having someone next to me in the pressurization room, where I'd always been alone before this, felt kind of strange.

LABEL: 0x403
STRING: 「This will be the last time we go through this.」

LABEL: 0x429
STRING: 「Are you ready?」

LABEL: 0x44E
STRING: We moved to the wheelhouse after we finished eating.

LABEL: 0x48A
STRING: Yukari pulled up the map of the <SHEEP III> on a display.

LABEL: 0x4DA
STRING: 「First, you two will enter the pressurization room and secure your diving suits by connecting them to the external hatch of the rescue ship.」

LABEL: 0x556
STRING: 「Once the water is poured and pressurization is done, the only thing that remains is the magnetic force...」

LABEL: 0x5AC
STRING: 「The pressure difference between the inside and outside of the skirt is gone due to the pressurization.」

LABEL: Split3
STRING: 「So you should be able to separate the skirt from the <SHEEP III> with a little force.」

LABEL: 0x62E
STRING: Tokiwa immediately raised her hand.

LABEL: 0x723
STRING: 「What will you do in the meantime, Yukari-san?」

LABEL: 0x768
STRING: 「I'll stay here and watch over you two.」

LABEL: 0x81C
STRING: 「Since it's dangerous to go near the emergency room.」

LABEL: 0x851
STRING: She sounded somewhat sad as she said that.

LABEL: 0x875
STRING: But, a moment later, her face looking forward was full of positive determination.

LABEL: 0x938
STRING: 「That's right, there's one more thing.」

LABEL: 0x95A
STRING: 「――Please take this.」

LABEL: 0x989
STRING: She held out a black box about five centimeters square.

LABEL: 0x9C2
STRING: It was a small, jet-black box that seemed to absorb all the light around it.

LABEL: 0xA71
STRING: 「What's this?」

LABEL: 0xA9A
STRING: 「An <Onyx>.」

LABEL: 0xABC
STRING: 「It's a VDR―voyage data recorder.」

LABEL: 0xAF8
STRING: A voyage data recorder... Kind of like a black box of an aircraft.

LABEL: 0xB5B
STRING: 「Is it... okay to remove it?」

LABEL: 0xBAC
STRING: 「Don't worry. The core of the recorder is still inside the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0xBF7
STRING: 「This <Onyx> is a duplicate of the information in the VDR.」

LABEL: 0xC40
STRING: 「However, it's just as sturdy as the real VDR, so it won't break under normal pressures or temperatures.」

LABEL: 0xCC3
STRING: 「With this... You can relay to the surface everything that happened on this ship.」

LABEL: 0xD26
STRING: ...I was the one who proposed this idea to Yukari.

LABEL: 0xDD3
STRING: After the accident seven years ago, the onboard VDR was never recovered.

LABEL: 0xE18
STRING: And even if it was recovered now, it would be too late.

LABEL: 0xE5C
STRING: If only the VDR had been found, I would have known my sister's final moments.

LABEL: 0xF15
STRING: So...

LABEL: 0xF2B
STRING: It was the duty of those who had been entrusted with "returning alive" to deliver information back to the surface.

LABEL: 0xF79
STRING: The <Onyx> literally contained everything within it.

LABEL: 0xFB7
STRING: Information from outside the <SHEEP III>―the water temperature, pressure, and the currents surrounding the ship.

LABEL: 0x1002
STRING: Information from inside the <SHEEP III>―physical data and the recordings of the cameras inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x1051
STRING: And... a message I just recorded for "someone" on the surface.

LABEL: 0x10A1
STRING: All hope, all despair, were locked up inside.

LABEL: 0x10DB
STRING: With this box, we could deliver them.

LABEL: 0x110D
STRING: To the surface. The fate of the three days that this ship went through.

LABEL: 0x1269
STRING: 「I'll... leave this to you, Tokiwa-san.」

LABEL: 0x1309
STRING: 「Never let go of it.」

LABEL: 0x13B4
STRING: 「――I won't.」

LABEL: 0x13E7
STRING: 「Well then...」

LABEL: 0x1405
STRING: 「Good luck, you two.」

LABEL: 0x146A
STRING: And so, Tokiwa and I both put on our diving suits.

LABEL: 0x14AA
STRING: I was used to putting one on by now, but Tokiwa seemed to struggle with it.

LABEL: 0x14E8
STRING: Because I was already wearing my diving suit and to prevent sexual harassment, Yukari was the one who helped Tokiwa put hers on.

LABEL: 0x15AD
STRING: After she finally managed to put on the suit, which took twice as long as me,

LABEL: 0x1631
STRING: I somehow managed to drag the now immobile Tokiwa to the pressurization room since she insisted the suit was too heavy for her to move on her own.

LABEL: 0x16C9
STRING: ――On the way there, the light inside the emergency room seemed to have decreased in number compared to before.

LABEL: 0x1782
STRING: 「――I have no regrets.」

LABEL: 0x17AC
STRING: Tokiwa's suit was already rigidly tied to the external hatch of the rescue ship with a rope.

LABEL: 0x1800
STRING: There was no need to worry―this method was certain.

LABEL: 0x182C
STRING: She would definitely make it back to the surface.

LABEL: 0x1850
STRING: 「Let's go, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x187F
STRING: 『Yes.』

LABEL: 0x189A
STRING: I pulled the lever inside the pressurization room.

LABEL: 0x18C6
STRING: For who knows how many times now, water began pouring in.

LABEL: 0x18EC
STRING: Filling the inside of the room.

LABEL: 0x1916
STRING: The water level rose in the blink of an eye.

LABEL: 0x193A
STRING: 「Tokiwa, are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x196D
STRING: 『I'm not scared.』

LABEL: 0x1990
STRING: She answered even though I didn't ask.

LABEL: 0x19BA
STRING: What an easy-to-understand girl.

LABEL: 0x19E6
STRING: Well, it was true that this could be a little scary at first...

LABEL: 0x1AEE
STRING: But, while I was thinking that, the flooding of the room came to an end.

LABEL: 0x1B12
STRING: I mustered all my strength and pushed the outside hatch of the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x1BBD
STRING: 「Hrngh...!」

LABEL: 0x1BD9
STRING: ...Not even the slightest movement.

LABEL: 0x1BFB
STRING: Was Yukari sure that all it would take was a little force?

LABEL: 0x1C39
STRING: It showed no sign of moving at all.

LABEL: 0x1C5F
STRING: But, after coming this far, I couldn't give up.

LABEL: 0x1C9B
STRING: 「Uooooooohh!!」

LABEL: 0x1CB7
STRING: I switched my position inside the pressurization room, using my whole body as a spring and planting myself with both my legs and back.

LABEL: 0x1D12
STRING: 『Go for it, Katagiri-san!』

LABEL: 0x1D4F
STRING: 『That's the spirit!』

LABEL: 0x1E36
STRING: Between their cheers, a creaking sound could be heard.

LABEL: 0x1E8A
STRING: ――Just a little more!

LABEL: 0x1F72
STRING: 「Move!!」

LABEL: 0x1F92
STRING: I felt like I was slipping.

LABEL: 0x2013
STRING: In an instant, the tension in my body was released, and I was thrown out of balance.

LABEL: 0x204B
STRING: Freed from the tight pressure, I lost my support and suddenly saw my feet.

LABEL: 0x209B
STRING: Beneath my feet, the place where the floor should have been...

LABEL: 0x20CB
STRING: Darkness peeked out from the rift I could see below―the border between the <SHEEP III> and the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x211A
STRING: The deep sea was peering back at me.

LABEL: 0x2134
STRING: ――It detached!

LABEL: 0x214E
STRING: The rescue ship detached!

LABEL: 0x216A
STRING: 「I did it!」

LABEL: 0x2195
STRING: 『Mission accomplished, Katagiri-san!』

LABEL: 0x21CE
STRING: 『Ohhhh!』

LABEL: 0x21EF
STRING: As soon as the connection between the ships was cut, the rescue ship began to move.

LABEL: 0x222D
STRING: The hull climbed slowly but surely outward―and upward―as it was rocked by the currents.

LABEL: 0x23A9
STRING: 『Uououooh!!』

LABEL: 0x23CC
STRING: Tokiwa rocked along with the movements of the ship.

LABEL: 0x23FE
STRING: Her body lost its gravity, and she was pulled along by the rope tied to the rescue ship and began to drift into the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x2464
STRING: Thank God... We were successful.

LABEL: 0x24EB
STRING: It was a success――

LABEL: 0x2566
STRING: I closed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x2588
STRING: If I could, I would have closed my ears too.

LABEL: 0x25BA
STRING: But even so, I couldn't turn off the speaker of my diving suit.

LABEL: 0x2631
STRING: 『...Wait.』

LABEL: 0x264B
STRING: 『Katagiri-san?』

LABEL: 0x26E3
STRING: Tokiwa's voice was full of anxiety.

LABEL: 0x2715
STRING: I couldn't answer her.

LABEL: 0x2739
STRING: Unlike Tokiwa, who was firmly tied to the rescue ship, the rope extending from my diving suit was quickly untied.

LABEL: 0x27B1
STRING: The second knot, tied to the rescue ship, was no longer there.

LABEL: 0x2800
STRING: The only one returning to the surface with the rescue ship%N

LABEL: 0x288E
STRING: will be you, Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x29A4
STRING: 「So, what exactly did you want to ask?」

LABEL: 0x29D7
STRING: 「...Sorry, I don't want to hear about what happened seven years ago.」

LABEL: 0x2A1B
STRING: 「I mean, of course I want to know, but there's something more important right now.」

LABEL: 0x2A61
STRING: 「――Do we have a spare tank for the diving suit?」

LABEL: 0x2B33
STRING: In an instant, Yukari's eyes opened wide.

LABEL: 0x2B57
STRING: Time stood still for a moment――

LABEL: 0x2B84
STRING: 「...Don't tell me.」

LABEL: 0x2BA5
STRING: 「Earlier, when I was out in the water, I heard a warning sound.」

LABEL: 0x2BE7
STRING: 「There's no oxygen left.」

LABEL: 0x2CA3
STRING: On the day of the accident, Tokiwa asked me to search the seafloor for shellfish.

LABEL: 0x2CE5
STRING: I had no idea how many hours worth of oxygen that alone used.

LABEL: 0x2D33
STRING: She should have realized the possibility earlier.

LABEL: 0x2D5B
STRING: However, her expression was strained, as if she hadn't expected this.

LABEL: 0x2DB3
STRING: Soon after, she lowered her gaze directly to her feet.

LABEL: 0x2E4E
STRING: 「...Unfortunately...」

LABEL: 0x2E6E
STRING: 「The spare tanks were scheduled to be loaded in the future.」

LABEL: 0x2EB3
STRING: In other words, there were no spare tanks on the ship.

LABEL: 0x2EE5
STRING: ...In a way, that was just as I had expected.

LABEL: 0x2F19
STRING: 「...How long will it take to get to the surface from here?」

LABEL: 0x2FD2
STRING: 「...I don't know.」

LABEL: 0x3060
STRING: 「The ballast weights have been removed, but the ballast tank itself hasn't been drained, so the ascent should be slower than usual.」

LABEL: 0x30E5
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x3101
STRING: As long as there were no spare oxygen tanks, I couldn't go underwater for who knows how long.

LABEL: 0x3165
STRING: If I ran out of oxygen along the way, there was nothing I could do about it.

LABEL: 0x31A3
STRING: That was like going out to your own death.

LABEL: 0x31D7
STRING: 「Okay...」

LABEL: 0x31F1
STRING: 「Yukari-san, listen to me...」

LABEL: 0x3219
STRING: 「Let's entrust everything to Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x32BE
STRING: 「Are you serious?!」

LABEL: 0x32DD
STRING: 「What else are we supposed to do?!」

LABEL: 0x337F
STRING: I couldn't help but raise my voice.

LABEL: 0x33A1
STRING: Yukari shrank back in fear but eventually opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x345A
STRING: 「...If there's even the slightest possibility, it'd be better to use a diving suit...」

LABEL: 0x34A5
STRING: 「There is a chance.」

LABEL: 0x34C7
STRING: 「As long as Tokiwa makes it to the surface, she'll tell them everything that happened on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x3533
STRING: 「Besides, if she can get the VDR information to the surface, they'll be able to tell everything about our current situation.」

LABEL: 0x35A6
STRING: About the flooding of the rear section and the contamination of the ship by <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x35E2
STRING: ――And the fact that there were still survivors down here.

LABEL: 0x3614
STRING: 「If that happens, even ROMLES won't be able to ignore the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x36C9
STRING: Yukari was surprised by my words.

LABEL: 0x370A
STRING: 「Wait... Do you really believe that everyone can escape?」

LABEL: 0x375D
STRING: 「Of course.」

LABEL: 0x3779
STRING: I wasn't bluffing.

LABEL: 0x37A3
STRING: We were alive.

LABEL: 0x37C9
STRING: We couldn't throw our lives away so quickly.

LABEL: 0x3836
STRING: not going to die that easily.」

LABEL: 0x3973
STRING: A voiceless expression reached my speaker.

LABEL: 0x399F
STRING: Her silent cry stung my heart.

LABEL: 0x39C7
STRING: Forgive me.

LABEL: 0x39E1
STRING: For not telling you anything.

LABEL: 0x3A07
STRING: Still, this was for the best...

LABEL: 0x3A98
STRING: A moment later, my body shook.

LABEL: 0x3AC4
STRING: I opened my eyes at the sudden shock that ran through my body.

LABEL: 0x3B61
STRING: When I looked up, I saw her holding onto the rope extending from my suit with one hand.

LABEL: 0x3BAD
STRING: She was grasping the small <Onyx> tightly in her other hand.

LABEL: 0x3BF9
STRING: ...Even though we were underwater, how could she move with her heavy diving suit on so well?

LABEL: 0x3C4D
STRING: Despite how she had been just a moment ago inside the ship...

LABEL: 0x3C8D
STRING: That was Saihouji Tokiwa for you.

LABEL: 0x3CB1
STRING: She could do it if she tried.

LABEL: 0x3D3D
STRING: 『Katagiri-san!』

LABEL: 0x3D59
STRING: 『Why?!』

LABEL: 0x3D7A
STRING: The girl screamed.

LABEL: 0x3D9C
STRING: Our eyes met through the two panes of pressure-resistant glass.

LABEL: 0x3DDF
STRING: Her face was colored by intense emotions that made it impossible to tell whether she was angry or sad.

LABEL: 0x3E47
STRING: She tried desperately to plead with me through her emotions.

LABEL: 0x3E81
STRING: Her face, covered with violent feelings, bore no resemblance to the jovial expression she'd worn earlier.

LABEL: 0x3F82
STRING: Tokiwa was always smiling brightly.

LABEL: 0x3FAE
STRING: She was a naive, childlike girl who never stopped smiling.

LABEL: 0x3FE8
STRING: Ah, this was wrong. Please stop.

LABEL: 0x4012
STRING: I didn't want to see that look on her face.

LABEL: 0x404E
STRING: I had betrayed her expectations yet again.

LABEL: 0x407A
STRING: Why was I always like this?

LABEL: 0x40AE
STRING: This was probably the only way I could do things.

LABEL: 0x4144
STRING: Tokiwa was being dragged by the rescue ship.

LABEL: 0x4174
STRING: What had happened to her?

LABEL: 0x41A0
STRING: Why was she the only one floating toward the surface?

LABEL: 0x41D4
STRING: It didn't seem to take long for the smart girl to figure it all out.

LABEL: 0x4224
STRING: The shallow tricks of adults must seem like child's play to her.

LABEL: 0x427E
STRING: I was sure she was angry that I had deceived her like this.

LABEL: 0x42BC
STRING: She must feel so frustrated.

LABEL: 0x4341
STRING: But, it's too bad, Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x436D
STRING: You always played around with us, but not this time.

LABEL: 0x43C5
STRING: Fate had been set in motion.

LABEL: 0x43EF
STRING: There was no turning back now.

LABEL: 0x4431
STRING: ――It was too late.

LABEL: 0x4451
STRING: No matter how smart you were, there was no stopping it――

LABEL: 0x448F
STRING: 「I'm sorry, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x44B1
STRING: 「I'll be waiting here.」

LABEL: 0x44DB
STRING: 「I'll leave the rest to you.」

LABEL: 0x4514
STRING: 『――Liar!』

LABEL: 0x4537
STRING: Tokiwa's answer to my late confession was harsh.

LABEL: 0x456B
STRING: Harsh, like an accusation or a verdict.

LABEL: 0x46C7
STRING: 「That's not good.」

LABEL: 0x46E5
STRING: 「You can't.」

LABEL: 0x46FF
STRING: 「I... won't tolerate lying.」

LABEL: 0x472F
STRING: Tokiwa hated lies and crookedness.

LABEL: 0x476D
STRING: This time, she had probably misjudged me.

LABEL: 0x47A5
STRING: But, that didn't matter.

LABEL: 0x47D7
STRING: I didn't care what she might think of me.

LABEL: 0x4811
STRING: What did that have to do with anything at this point?

LABEL: 0x491F
STRING: 「Yeah, that's right. I'm a liar.」

LABEL: 0x494D
STRING: 「But you already knew that, didn't you?」

LABEL: 0x498F
STRING: I said it teasingly.

LABEL: 0x49B9
STRING: I meant to make light of the situation, but Tokiwa didn't reply.

LABEL: 0x49F7
STRING: All I could hear was her quiet breathing.

LABEL: 0x4A27
STRING: Damn it... I didn't know I would make her so angry that she wouldn't even respond.

LABEL: 0x4A6F
STRING: No, she probably wasn't just angry.

LABEL: 0x4AA5
STRING: At the very end, she was betrayed by me yet again――

LABEL: 0x4AD5
STRING: How disappointing and shocking that must be.

LABEL: 0x4B05
STRING: ...I was sure that she wouldn't forgive me.

LABEL: 0x4B39
STRING: 「Yes, I'm a liar...」

LABEL: 0x4B67
STRING: 「Did you already forget that when we met after the accident, I used a false name?」

LABEL: 0x4BB9
STRING: 「If you point out that I'm a liar at this point, it doesn't hurt me at all.」

LABEL: 0x4C7E
STRING: A smile broke on my face as I said it.

LABEL: 0x4CAA
STRING: What the hell was I saying?

LABEL: 0x4CD8
STRING: I wished I wouldn't have said anything.

LABEL: 0x4D02
STRING: Why did I keep talking nonsense like this...?

LABEL: 0x4D40
STRING: This could be the last time we'd ever see each other.

LABEL: 0x4D72
STRING: All this time, I had tried to get others to believe me, but now I was branding myself a liar...

LABEL: 0x4DB2
STRING: Just what was I trying to do?

LABEL: 0x4DFE
STRING: Would it make it easier for us to part ways if she hated me?

LABEL: 0x4E2E
STRING: That wasn't a cool reason at all.

LABEL: 0x4EC0
STRING: I was simply scared.

LABEL: 0x4EE0
STRING: I was just scared that these days would end, that our relationship would be cut off.

LABEL: 0x4F34
STRING: I had talked so high and mighty about saving everyone, yet I couldn't even make a single girl smile...

LABEL: 0x4FA2
STRING: I was so lame if I did say so myself.

LABEL: 0x5027
STRING: 「That's why――」

LABEL: 0x5072
STRING: 『I know that.』

LABEL: 0x509E
STRING: 『Katagiri-san's a liar. He's a bad person. A hopeless person.』

LABEL: 0x50DE
STRING: 『Hopeless... and a complete mess...』

LABEL: 0x511D
STRING: 「...Hey, don't you think that's going a bit too far?」

LABEL: 0x5168
STRING: 『I know!』

LABEL: 0x5188
STRING: 『I know that...!』

LABEL: 0x51AF
STRING: Tokiwa screamed.

LABEL: 0x51D3
STRING: However, there was no energy behind her anger.

LABEL: 0x5201
STRING: Her feeble, decaying voice was painful.

LABEL: 0x523B
STRING: ――A shriek.

LABEL: 0x525B
STRING: Why did she sound so pained?

LABEL: 0x528D
STRING: Why was her voice so heartbroken?

LABEL: 0x52C1
STRING: It was almost like she――

LABEL: 0x52E9
STRING: Ah, I see.

LABEL: 0x5305
STRING: I finally understood.

LABEL: 0x5380
STRING: Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x5396
STRING: Are you crying right now――?

LABEL: 0x542C
STRING: 『You're a liar.』

LABEL: 0x5456
STRING: 『I remember being lied to so many times.』

LABEL: 0x5492
STRING: 『It wasn't just your fake name.』

LABEL: 0x54BE
STRING: 『There was Scalyfoot, too.』

LABEL: 0x54E0
STRING: 『You said you'd get one for me, but you never did.』

LABEL: 0x5522
STRING: 『There were other times as well.』

LABEL: 0x5544
STRING: 『Other times...』

LABEL: 0x556B
STRING: Her voice grew quieter and quieter as she spoke.

LABEL: 0x55A3
STRING: Until it finally disappeared.

LABEL: 0x55BF
STRING: But her grip on the rope didn't loosen at all.

LABEL: 0x55F7
STRING: She was grabbing the rope with an unusual amount of strength and would not let go.

LABEL: 0x5633
STRING: Her thin and pale arms looked as if they'd never held anything heavier than chopsticks,

LABEL: 0x5675
STRING: but nevertheless, she held onto the rope

LABEL: 0x5697
STRING: with strength unimaginable from her unathletic and somewhat clumsy figure.

LABEL: 0x56E3
STRING: She was trying desperately to fight against fate.

LABEL: 0x571F
STRING: All the while wearing that diving suit restricting her movement.

LABEL: 0x5755
STRING: Calmly and gently...

LABEL: 0x577B
STRING: No matter how hard I looked at her, I couldn't understand.

LABEL: 0x57B3
STRING: Where did this power lie dormant in her?

LABEL: 0x57ED
STRING: What gave her such strength?

LABEL: 0x587C
STRING: ...You idiot.

LABEL: 0x589A
STRING: Even though you're finally about to be saved and can return to the surface,

LABEL: 0x58D0
STRING: why are you so desperately――

LABEL: 0x5959
STRING: 「Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x5971
STRING: 「I'll get you as many rare shellfish as you want.」

LABEL: 0x59B7
STRING: 「And not just Scalyfoot, ones that no one has ever seen before.」

LABEL: 0x5A3F
STRING: 「So, please go and call for help in my stead.」

LABEL: 0x5A89
STRING: 「And... make sure that box gets to the surface.」

LABEL: 0x5ACA
STRING: 『You're just trying to fool me again――』

LABEL: 0x5AFC
STRING: 『It's not fair. You're lying.』

LABEL: 0x5B24
STRING: 『Besides, Katagiri-san...』

LABEL: 0x5B6F
STRING: Tokiwa was growing ever more desperate.

LABEL: 0x5B9D
STRING: For someone like her, who had always been somewhat detached from the real world, to be so fixated on one thing... That alone was a serious matter.

LABEL: 0x5C11
STRING: But... no matter how hard she tried, she was still just one girl.

LABEL: 0x5C61
STRING: She wasn't a hero from American comics, nor was she a TV monster.

LABEL: 0x5CA3
STRING: She was just a single, frail girl.

LABEL: 0x5CD3
STRING: She couldn't ignore the laws of physics.

LABEL: 0x5D62
STRING: She clenched the rope tightly.

LABEL: 0x5D90
STRING: As time passed, her hand holding the rope gradually slipped.

LABEL: 0x5DC8
STRING: She tried her best, adjusted her grip, lost it, and adjusted it again.

LABEL: 0x5E00
STRING: However, she was slowly getting farther and farther away.

LABEL: 0x5E34
STRING: Tokiwa's pained and desperate face was growing distant.

LABEL: 0x5E6A
STRING: 「I'm not trying to fool you.」

LABEL: 0x5E9C
STRING: 「I'm a man, you see. I keep my promises.」

LABEL: 0x5EE3
STRING: 『...Really?』

LABEL: 0x5F0C
STRING: 「Of course. But if you don't trust me, then――」

LABEL: 0x5F69
STRING: 『――It's a promise.』

LABEL: 0x5F8E
STRING: Her eyes were serious.

LABEL: 0x5FA8
STRING: Droplets of water were falling from them.

LABEL: 0x5FD4
STRING: That probably wasn't seawater.

LABEL: 0x6059
STRING: You're such an idiot, Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x607D
STRING: You won't be able to see properly if you cry like that, right?

LABEL: 0x60BF
STRING: If you sound all serious like that, I...

LABEL: 0x615F
STRING: 『It's a promise, okay?!』

LABEL: 0x6183
STRING: 『Katagiri-san!』

LABEL: 0x6219
STRING: Her outline distorted.

LABEL: 0x6235
STRING: Little by little, Tokiwa's figure was getting blurry.

LABEL: 0x62DA
STRING: It was regrettable.

LABEL: 0x62F6
STRING: I wanted to see her clearly one last time, but she was already disappearing before me.

LABEL: 0x63B7
STRING: I heard the sound of her sniffling.

LABEL: 0x63D1
STRING: Her voice trembled violently.

LABEL: 0x63EF
STRING: I could hear her voice, which I wanted to hear until the very end, clearly.

LABEL: 0x6443
STRING: It was reaching me.

LABEL: 0x6469
STRING: I had to answer.

LABEL: 0x64EF
STRING: 「Yeah, it's a promise.」

LABEL: 0x651C
STRING: 『...Wait for me.』

LABEL: 0x6544
STRING: 『Because, we promised.』

LABEL: 0x656D
STRING: 「I will.」

LABEL: 0x6596
STRING: 『Yukari-san as well.』

LABEL: 0x65E6
STRING: A gasping sound.

LABEL: 0x6602
STRING: Beyond the speaker, in the wheelhouse...

LABEL: 0x662C
STRING: It was Yukari's breathing, who was sitting in front of the monitor.

LABEL: 0x66C6
STRING: 『You can hear me, right?』

LABEL: 0x671F
STRING: 『I hear you...』

LABEL: 0x6742
STRING: Her small voice.

LABEL: 0x675A
STRING: I couldn't see her, so all I heard was her voice.

LABEL: 0x6796
STRING: Yukari answered in the same bright tone as always.

LABEL: 0x67D0
STRING: She tried to act calm, but it was an impossible task.

LABEL: 0x680C
STRING: Her breath was leaking out between her words.

LABEL: 0x683A
STRING: It's okay, Yukari.

LABEL: 0x685A
STRING: It was like she was trying to suppress her overflowing emotions.

LABEL: 0x689C
STRING: And that made it all the more painful.

LABEL: 0x6930
STRING: 『Katagiri-san isn't the only one I haven't forgiven.』

LABEL: 0x6976
STRING: 『Yukari-san, I haven't forgiven you either.』

LABEL: 0x69B9
STRING: Tokiwa's voice was consoling Yukari, who seemed to be in more pain than either of us.

LABEL: 0x69F5
STRING: I was sure it was painful for her too.

LABEL: 0x6A1D
STRING: She was still desperately clinging on to the rope, but still――

LABEL: 0x6A64
STRING: 『So, don't go dying by yourself.』

LABEL: 0x6AA8
STRING: 『I'm sure I'll come back to get you...』

LABEL: 0x6B0D
STRING: 『I'll make sure to live and make amends.』

LABEL: 0x6B3C
STRING: Her voice sounded like she was in pain.

LABEL: 0x6B56
STRING: But, there was something besides sadness there.

LABEL: 0x6B90
STRING: There wasn't just the pain of parting.

LABEL: 0x6BC9
STRING: 『I can't die yet.』

LABEL: 0x6BF7
STRING: 『For that reason, you must go to the surface first.』

LABEL: 0x6C41
STRING: 『Deliver the <Onyx> to ROMLES.』

LABEL: 0x6C79
STRING: 『――Connect our hopes.』

LABEL: 0x6D05
STRING: Hope――

LABEL: 0x6D1B
STRING: The bottom of the sea was dark, deep, and endless.

LABEL: 0x6DAC
STRING: There were sunken ships, overflowing death, and ugly conflicts.

LABEL: 0x6DD8
STRING: Compared to the vast sea, all of this might have been just a hopelessly small event.

LABEL: 0x6E2E
STRING: However, in the midst of such small despair, we had found a single ray of hope.

LABEL: 0x6E74
STRING: A feeble yet strong thread connecting us to the surface.

LABEL: 0x6F07
STRING: 「That's right...」

LABEL: 0x6F23
STRING: 「You're our hope.」

LABEL: 0x6F51
STRING: Even if we died, Tokiwa would survive.

LABEL: 0x6F9B
STRING: She would become proof of our lives.

LABEL: 0x6FCD
STRING: She was a curious person, so she might forget about us as she came into contact with various things.

LABEL: 0x7047
STRING: But then, so be it.

LABEL: 0x7071
STRING: She should just forget all these painful memories.

LABEL: 0x714D
STRING: The events of the past three days that occurred on the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x7184
STRING: Even if she forgot everything, there was no doubt that something would remain inside her.

LABEL: 0x71CC
STRING: So, that was fine.

LABEL: 0x71EC
STRING: That was all there was to it――

LABEL: 0x727C
STRING: 「I'm counting on you, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x72AD
STRING: 『Wait for me...』

LABEL: 0x72D3
STRING: 『I'll definitely, definitely――』

LABEL: 0x72FE
STRING: Her hand... let go.

LABEL: 0x7379
STRING: 「――Don't worry.」

LABEL: 0x7393
STRING: 「We'll be here.」

LABEL: 0x73D7
STRING: Live――

LABEL: 0x73F3
STRING: Tokiwa was getting farther and farther away.

LABEL: 0x7419
STRING: The rescue ship was rising gently.

LABEL: 0x7445
STRING: The darkness soon obscured her figure.

LABEL: 0x7477
STRING: No longer would my words reach her.

LABEL: 0x74A5
STRING: The thread connecting me to Tokiwa had been severed.

LABEL: 0x74DD
STRING: The rest was no longer ours to know.

LABEL: 0x751B
STRING: But I was sure she would make it safely to the surface.

LABEL: 0x7565
STRING: She would live on.

LABEL: 0x758F
STRING: She would live her life, until the very end――

LABEL: 0x75B8
STRING: Eventually, I heard...

LABEL: 0x75DE
STRING: ...A voice coming from the speaker.

LABEL: 0x75FE
STRING: Tokiwa's voice.

LABEL: 0x7684
STRING: 『I believe you.』

LABEL: 0x76A2
STRING: 『Neither of you are liars.』

LABEL: 0x76F9
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x7724
STRING: 『Eh?』

LABEL: 0x773F
STRING: Her voice, however, soon disappeared.

LABEL: 0x7773
STRING: Maybe it was just my imagination.

LABEL: 0x77FE
STRING: ...No, this was the sea.

LABEL: 0x787F
STRING: A mysterious realm that had yet to be explored.

LABEL: 0x790A
STRING: There was a possibility that our voices could reach each other through a power we did not yet understand.

LABEL: 0x79C7
STRING: ――At the bottom of the pitch-black sea, where everything had been lost...

LABEL: 0x7A54
STRING: A man gave everything to the heavens as commanded and prayed, covered in scars.

LABEL: 0x7AF5
STRING: There was only one thing left for him.

LABEL: 0x7B7E
STRING: A curse called faith.

LABEL: 0x7BFF
STRING: Only silence lay at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x7C8E
STRING: ...But in truth, that wasn't all there was...

LABEL: 0x7D2D
STRING: As we now

LABEL: 0x7D42
STRING: knew well.
